articles.title: Amber Heard settles defamation case against Johnny Depp - BBC
articles.description: Ms Heard will pay her ex-husband $1m after jury found she had defamed him in a Washington Post article.
articles.content:
US actress Amber Heard will pay Johnny Depp $1m (£820,000) in a settlement of their defamation suit, lawyers for Mr Depp told the BBC.
The former couple faced off in court this spring in a high-prof… [+1909 chars]

articles.description: The Los Angeles County Medical Examiner-Coroner ruled that the social media star passed away from 'combined effects of alprazolam, fentanyl, and lorazepam.'
articles.content: Six months after 19-year-old TikTok star Cooper Noriega was found dead in a mall parking lot, his cause of death has been revealed as a lethal combination of fentanyl and two medications used to trea… [+8392 chars]
